carrier_objectives.descreption: Hello! I'am Andras! I have a great news for you!  I become a passionate front-end developer this year and behind me there are a lot of learning time in smaller individual and team projects. I managed to learn how to find solution for any challenge in web development, even if I don't know something in the first glance. I like to learn it!

cerfitications.details: The fundamental scope of learning were HTML, CSS and Javascript in the first half of the education. In the second half on the learning path I learnt and mastered the usage of React js, Node_Express js, SASS, Firebase authentication and Cloud Storage. During this period there were individual and team projects that had to be managed as live project. I acquired deep knowledge of GitHub tools that were used daily Meanwhile, I had apply clean coding policy. I received continuous mentoring support from professionals.The editor was VS Code and many other extensions and libraries

The motivation to take this online course was to gain deep knowledge of Javascript programming language, working of web browsers, HTML and CSS.During the training I managed to understand and use Vanilla Javascript for building dynamic websites. I used VS Code as editor for developing

In the pathway I managed to learn the key concepts and techniques of game development that are applied in large projects.I learned how to do profile optimization for managing performance issues.I used  Unity Visual Studio and C-Sharp language for developing

The scope was to understand and apply the mathematical calculations and techniques in game development.The main topics were transformation, translations, 3d vector calculations, matrix calculations  and quaternions.I used  Unity Visual Studio and C-Sharp language for developing
The training topic was fundamentals of Java development language.I used Netbeans for implementing our codes

works.role_descreption: I had to develop and maintain relationships with customers and suppliers

I had to coordinate team members, consultants and other resources across multiple projects and departments. Telematics tender and agreement: Implementation of tender_related agreements. SAP TMS implementation: Customer_side “Solution Architect”
Management and implementation of projects entrusted to me. Keeping regular status reports

works.enterprice: Waberer's International: United Kingdom and Ireland department
works.role_descreption: Achieved monthly sales goals by promoting product benefits and enrolling new clients.Economical distribution of freight capacities between different loading bays.Supplying commercial areas with necessary information about loading capacities
Coordination and organization of the delivery of freight shipments.Implementation of customs administration

studies.other: Thesis topic: Vehicle tracking in everyday life and in the field of freight transport.

studies.school: Gábor Bethlen Vocational School of Transport and Economics
Gábor Bethlen Vocational School of Transport and Economics

skills.other: Creativity, Collaboration, Team player, Problem solving, Must-do attitude, Leadership

other.Interests: Implementation of spectacular developments, Unity game development
